# Dependencies
node_modules/

# Runtime data
pids
*.pid
*.seed
*.pid.lock

# Compiled binary addons
build/
dist/

# dotenv environment variables file
.env
.env.local
.dev.vars

# PM2
.pm2/
pids/
logs/
*.log

# Wrangler
.wrangler/

# Backup files
*.backup
*.bak
*.tar.gz
*.zip

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
